pr_title: Adds 5 new scroll items with unique effects

timeline.message:
Adds 5 new scroll items with unique effects:
A colony home teleportation scroll, which teleports the user to the registered colony. Made by the enchanter
A colony home area teleportation scroll which teleports the user and nearby players to the colony. Made by the enchanter
A regeneration scroll, granting regeneration to the player and citizens around him, found in chests.
A guard help scroll which temporarily summons the guards of a registered guard building to the user on follow mode.
A worker highlight scroll which can be used on a worker building an highlights the worker with a glow effect and gives him a slight speed effect too.

Fix some of our sounds beeing stereo and not playing positioned

timeline.message:
Small statemachine improvement (#6171)

This changes the statemachine to no longer do hash lookups frequently when it already does know/has a reference to the result. Instead we do the lookup once the state changes and keep the reference to the current state's transitions.
Removed streams in the basic statemachine aswell.

fix #6161 (#6167)

Performance improvement
Fix free blocks config
Fix abandoned colony calc
Fix infinite request loops
Fix client side desyncs of racks
